draggable.description:
Whether the drawer content is draggable.
If false, the drawer can only be dragged by the grabber.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the drawer when the escape key is pressed.

closeOnInteractOutside.description: Whether to close the drawer when the outside is clicked.

closeThreshold.description: The threshold distance for dismissing the drawer.

defaultOpen.description: The initial open state of the drawer.

defaultSnapPoint.description: The default snap point of the drawer.

finalFocusEl.description: Element to receive focus when the sheet is closed.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  backdrop: string
  positioner: string
  content: string
  title: string
  trigger: string
  grabber: string
  grabberIndicator: string
  closeTrigger: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the drawer. Useful for composition.

initialFocusEl.description: Element to receive focus when the sheet is opened.

modal.description: Whether to prevent pointer interaction outside the element and hide all content below it.

preventDragOnScroll.description: Whether to prevent dragging on scrollable elements.

preventScroll.description: Whether to prevent scrolling behind the sheet when it's opened

restoreFocus.description: Whether to restore focus to the element that had focus before the sheet was opened.

snapPoints.description: The snap points of the drawer.

snapToSequentialPoints.description: Whether the drawer should snap to sequential points when swiping.

swipeDirection.description: The direction in which the drawer can be swiped.

swipeVelocityThreshold.description: The threshold velocity (in pixels/s) for closing the drawer.

trapFocus.description: Whether to trap focus inside the sheet when it's opened.
